query:
SELECT
                COUNT(*) as "total_files: i64",
                SUM(CASE WHEN ast_analyzed = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "analyzed_files: i64",
                SUM(element_count) as "total_elements: i64",
                AVG(complexity_score) as "avg_complexity: f64"
            FROM repository_files
            WHERE attachment_id = ?
